answers.answer: I am 36 weeks and my baby boy is measuring two weeks ahead.. last time he was three weeks ahead so I will be having an ultrasound next week! I am only one centimeter dialated and would like to have him naturally so I hope I won't have to get induced. I have gestational diabetes and if he gets too big I will have to be induced
My doctor has never even checked if I'm dilated yet..kinda weird to me..eh

My last three got really big at the end this might be a normal size baby. Which will be nice change.  However estimate are off. Even the US can be too. I was told at 36 wks my first some was already 9 lbs. He was born 7 lbs 12 oz.  My other three were a lot bigger 8# 11oz , 9#, 10# 2 oz and they were said to be 8 lbs so my are never right. Well see if this one is small. I think lower 8#

question: I had an appointment today and my doc said the baby feels large so I will get a surprise ultrasound in a week..Lil one may be earlier than expected..anyone else been told this? I'm kinda nervous already and this doesn't help lol both my daughters were 3 days past due date so I have no experience with this..
title: 37 Weeks tomorrow..big boy!
